attributes.action: zero rate VAT on the purchase of Bicycles & Tricycles over £129, reduce VAT to 5% for all Cycle parts & accessories and zero rate VAT on all Cycle safety equipment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Interest in Cycling is at an all time high, with success at the Olympics, Fuel Prices and increased costs of transportation helping to generate further interest in the Sport. 

From 2009 Cycle prices are set to rise and this will limit the ability of more people to get involved in a great passtime and wonderful form of exercise. 

We petition the Prime Minister to:

1) Zero rate VAT on Bicycle & Tricycle purchases over £129

2) Zero rate VAT on all Cycle Safety Equipment 

3) Reduce VAT to 5% on all Cycle Parts & Accessories.

In doing so the Prime Minister can help ensure the continued growth of Cycling in the UK leading to a healthier population and further reducing the impact of transportation upon the Environment.
